LanguageData.CookMealLavishExt.label: cook 2 lavish meals ext.
LanguageData.CookMealLavishExt.description: Cook a very complex meal from simple ingredients. Uses 4x as many ingredients compared to a simple meal.
LanguageData.CookMealLavishExt20.label: cook 20 lavish meals ext.
LanguageData.CookMealLavishExt20.description: Cook a very complex meal from simple ingredients. Uses 4x (+ an additional 5%) as many ingredients compared to a simple meal.
LanguageData.CookMealLavishExt50.label: cook 50 lavish meals ext.
LanguageData.CookMealLavishExt50.description: Cook a very complex meal from simple ingredients. Uses 4x (+ an additional 10%) as many ingredients compared to a simple meal.
LanguageData.CookMealLavishLunchbox.label: cook 2 lavish lunchbox meals
LanguageData.CookMealLavishLunchbox.description: Cook a very complex lunchbox meal from simple ingredients. Uses 5x as many ingredients compared to a simple meal. This meal does not spoil or deteriorate.
LanguageData.CreateImproveHay.label: create improved hay
